name: Heroes Never Die
description: Heroes Never Die is a Next-Gen VR shooting game designed by Frostbite Games. Not as other shooting games, players should save ammo and time. Try to find time bonus and possible strategy to achieve high score. Many heroes can be used and every stage is worth to explore.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS® 7,8,8.1,10 (64-BIT Required) Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX™-6300 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher) Additional Notes: requires an HTC Vive
recommended_requirements: OS: WINDOWS® 7,8,8.1,10 (64-BIT Required) Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz or AMD equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1070 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher) Additional Notes: requires an HTC Vive
